alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 31 at 2:35AM CDT until November 01 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS, VERY LOW HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS... .The combination of breezy post-frontal northerly winds, critically low humidities, and dry to very dry fuels with ongoing drought conditions could make for dangerous fire weather conditions on Wednesday. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHEAST ALABAMA, SOUTHWEST GEORGIA, THE FLORIDA PANHANDLE, AND MOST OF THE FLORIDA BIG BEND.... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 065, 066, 067, 068, and 069.Fire weather zones 007, 008, 009, 010, 011, and 108.Fire weather zones 120, 121, 122, 123, 124, 125, 142, 143, 144, 145, 155, and 156. * WIND...North around 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 15 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
